name: Bloody Ending
description:
Presentation

Bloody ending is an oldschool rpg that won't leave you untouched.
You travel through a world and through cities with their own story.
Will you make it to the end of the adventure? Are you ready to face the truth?



Story

The story is far too long and complex to write it in a few lines here.
I invite you to discover it by yourself and to live it through this exciting game.


Features

- More than 10 hours of play

- Multiple weapons and armor to forge

- Different puzzle styles

- In French and English.

- A story full of twists.

- Some likeable characters... some hateful.

- Dozen of powers per character to learn.

- A journey through diverse and various environments (desert, snow, forest, ...)
